                                <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 折叠评论的文案 end -->

                                        <!-- <i class="icon-thumb-down"></i> -->

                                    </div>

                                    <!-- 回复 -->

                                </div>
                            </div>

                </div>
                <div class="verfily-input">
                    <input placeholder="输入验证码"/>
                    <div class="verfily-code red J_send_msg" >发送短信验证码</div>
                </div>
                <div class="agree-box">
                    <div class="agreen-box">
                        <div class="checkbox">
                            <img src="https://res.smzdm.com/business/login/select-selected.png"/>
                        </div>
                        <div class="checkbox-info">
                            我已阅读并同意<span><a href="https://res.smzdm.com/protocol/user/20220119.html" target="_blank">《用户协议》</a><a href="https://res.smzdm.com/protocol/privacy/20220715.html" target="_blank">《“什么值得买”个人信息保护政策》》</a></span>       
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="mobile-submit">确定</div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div> -->
    <!-- comment_wrap end -->

    <!--顶部  爆料  share模块 -->
    <div class="baoliao-box">
    <p class="txt">
        爆料是一件简单又好玩的事，动动手指就能把你认可的好价商品分享给千万值友，还能获得大量金币奖励，兑换礼品卡和值得买定制礼品！赶快行动起来吧！
        <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="J_check_video">点击观看视频吧~</a>
        <i class="J_check_video icon-video-o-thin"></i>
    </p>
        <div class="video">
        </div>
        <a href="https://www.smzdm.com/baoliao/" target="_blank" class="btn-go" onclick="dataLayer.push({'event':'1210013','name':'右侧爆料模块'})">我要爆料</a>
    <div class="rookie-award-container">
        <div class="J_rookie_award rookie-award">
            <span>爆料新人可获额外奖励</span>
            <i class="icon icon-info-mark-o-thin"></i>
            <div class="rookie-award-desc">
                <h5>新人奖励</h5>
                <p>前5篇发布银牌及以上层级爆料每篇奖励3金币，第6至10篇每篇奖励6金币。</p>
